General.Name: Xuchang Ketop Testing Research Ins
General.Description: Xuchang KETOP Testing Research Institute Co.,Ltd operates as a third-party testing company in China. It provides testing services for power system secondary equipment, smart micro-grid equipment and systems, and electric vehicle charging and battery swap systems. Xuchang KETOP Testing Research Institute Co.,Ltd was founded in 2005 and is based in Xuchang, China.
